page.title: 06QUARRY VEHICLE DRIVERS
page.content:
The shovel driver works (on average) 7\ hours with \ an hour for meal time. He has been working at Tunstead for 19 years. When asked if he would like a different job in the quarry he said he would like to stay where he is, as it is a very enjoyable job. He earns about Â£130-Â£150 a week, on average, and works more or less the same hours every day. The weather does not affect his work.
